permafrost.tundra.server.http.handler

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.server.http.handler.Handler
      • permafrost.tundra.server.http.handler.StartableHandler
        • permafrost.tundra.server.http.handler.Logger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Startable

    public class Logger
extends StartableHandler
    Logs HTTP requests and responses to a log file.

        public boolean handle(com.wm.app.b2b.server.ProtocolState context,
                      java.util.Iterator<Handler> handlers)
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      com.wm.app.b2b.server.AccessException
        Processes an HTTP request.
        Overrides:
        handle in class Handler
        Parameters:
        context - The HTTP request context.
        handlers - The queue of subsequent handlers to be called to handle the request.
        Returns:
        True if the request was processed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IO error occurs.
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.AccessException - If a security error occurs.
